column1: 9164841,s1,T2,T3,To gain a better understanding of the mechanism of binding to the human ,mineralocorticoid receptor, (,hMR,"), we developed a new monoclonal antibody (mAb) raised against the hormone-binding domain (HBD).",Not_a_complex
